SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(TAB.`billTime`, #{billReport.dataTimeType}) AS dateTime,
TABT.`billTypeName`,
SUM((CASE TAB.`revexpType` WHEN '1' THEN -TAB.`billAmount` ELSE TAB.`billAmount` END)) AS billAmount, COUNT(1) AS billCount FROM T_ACCOUNT_BILL TAB LEFT JOIN `T_ACCOUNT_BILLTYPE` TABT ON TAB.`billTypeId`=TABT.`billTypeId`
TAB.`logicDel`='N' AND TAB.`userId`=#{billReport.userId}
AND TAB.`billTypeId`=#{billReport.billTypeId}
AND unix_timestamp(TAB.`billTime`) >=unix_timestamp(#{billReport.beginTime})
AND unix_timestamp(TAB.`billTime`) <=unix_timestamp(#{billReport.endTime})
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(TAB.`billTime`, #{billReport.dataTimeType})
GROUP BY TAB.`billTypeId`
LIMIT #{page.startNum},#{page.pageSize}
